photos.title: Bernese Mountain Dog
photos.description: The Bernese Mountain Dog is a large-sized breed of dog, one of the four breeds of Sennenhund-type dogs from the Swiss Alps.

photos.title: Corgi
photos.description: The Welsh Corgi is a small type of herding dog that originated in Wales.

photos.title: German Shepherd
photos.description: The German Shepherd is a breed of medium to large-sized working dog that originated in Germany.

photos.title: Golden Retriever
photos.description: The Golden Retriever is a medium-large gun dog that was bred to retrieve shot waterfowl, such as ducks and upland game birds, during hunting and shooting parties.

photos.title: Husky
photos.description: A husky is a sled dog used in the polar regions. One can differentiate huskies from other dog types by their fast pulling-style.

photos.title: Rottweiler
photos.description: The Rottweiler is a breed of domestic dog, regarded as medium-to-large or large.
